name: licenseVideos
description: This endpoint gets licenses for one or more videos. You must specify the video IDs in the body parameter and the size and subscription ID either in the query parameter or with each video ID in the body parameter. Values in the body parameter override values in the query parameters. The download links in the response are valid for 8 hours.

subscription_id.description: The subscription ID to use for licensing

size.description: The size of the video to license

search_id.description: The Search ID that led to this licensing event

body.description: List of videos to request licenses for and information about each license transaction; these values override the defaults in the query parameters

$ul: **errors**: Error list; appears only if there was an error
**total_count**: Total count of all results across all pages
